safetyTips: COVID safe. Timed collection slots & masks worn on collection & delivery.
name: THE KENT KITCHEN
description: Established catering business offering freshly prepared dishes which include local Kent ingredients.  Baked Treats, Weekend Takeaways & Family Menus.  For a special occasion or to have a break from cooking.  Pre-order for collection from Stowting, Ashford or delivery can be arranged depending on items ordered. Contact us via Phone or Email to discuss!
